oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Mary Chapin Carpenter Interview - Biff Collie - Tape 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Tape 1 of 2. Recording of an interview with Mary Chapin Carpenter (performer) conducted by Biff Collie.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Mary Chapin Carpenter; Biff Collie
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (00:00) Mary Chapin Carpenter asks the listener to join in on her stories of travel -- (00:08) Carpenter mentions she is (Biff) Collie's cohost on Music City Album Review -- (00:15) Carpenter mentions she is Collie's cohost on Music City Album Review -- (00:22) Carpenter mentions her first album "Hometown Girl" and her current album "State of the Heart" -- (00:27) Carpenter mentions she won the weekly DJ USA with Collie -- (00:39) Carpenter laughs as she asks Collie what to do next -- (00:55) Carpenter mentions she is Collie's cohost on Music City Album Review -- (01:01) Carpenter says "Don't leave home without me" and mentions she is Collie's cohost on Music City Album Review -- (01:13) Carpenter says to not leave your home without her and she is Collie's cohost on Music City Album Review -- (01:25) Carpenter says he is Collie's cohost reviewing "State of the Heart" -- (01:33) Carpenter welcomes and mentions she is Collie's cohost on Music City Album Review -- (01:43) Carpenter menti
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Carpenter, Mary Chapin, 1958-; Collie, Biff;
